name: Rol'An'Go Megadrive Edition - Demo
description:
Hi all,
Here is my new project for Megadrive, Rol'An'Go an old project on PC I done 4 years ago.

It's a very complex game for the Megadrive and a hard challenge ... But, Papi Commando and Bomb on Basic City give me a lot of experience for.
It's a Turn/Turn gamplay like Heroes of might and magic.

For now, it's just a Demo where you can travel in a great map with your 4 heroes.

Controls :

- PAD : Scroll the Map.

- A Button : Player Selection, Moving, Options ( Press A for 3 Sec )

- B Button Change Heroes.

Enjoy ! :)

Vetea
